segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the water overflowing or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what she's thinking about that's making her so unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being quite brave, balancing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing similar things when I was a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't fall and ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is spreading quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip and fall when she finally notices it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
